mapper.select: SELECT T1.MENU_NO, T1.MENU_URL, T1.P_MENU_CD, T1.MENU_CD, T1.MENU_NAME, T1.MENU_URL, T1.MENU_LEVEL, T1.MENU_TYPE, T1.USE_YN, T1.MENU_ORDER, T1.LANGUAGE_CODE, (SELECT MAX(MODULE_ID) FROM XBT_BASELINE_EDU_DATE WHERE MENU_CD = T1.MENU_CD) AS MODULE_ID, (SELECT MAX(MODULE_TYPE) FROM XBT_BASELINE_EDU_DATE WHERE MENU_CD = T1.MENU_CD) AS MODULE_TYPE, (SELECT MAX(MENU_TYPE) FROM XBT_BASELINE_EDU_DATE WHERE MENU_CD = T1.MENU_CD) AS MENU_TYPE FROM XBT_STU_MENU T1 WHERE T1.LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode}

SELECT T1.MENU_NO, T1.MENU_URL, T1.P_MENU_CD, T1.MENU_CD, T1.MENU_NAME, T1.MENU_URL, T1.MENU_LEVEL, T1.MENU_TYPE, T1.USE_YN, T1.MENU_ORDER, T1.LANGUAGE_CODE, (SELECT MAX(MODULE_ID) FROM XBT_BASELINE_EDU_DATE WHERE MENU_CD = T1.MENU_CD) AS MODULE_ID, (SELECT MAX(MODULE_TYPE) FROM XBT_BASELINE_EDU_DATE WHERE MENU_CD = T1.MENU_CD) AS MODULE_TYPE, (SELECT MAX(MENU_TYPE) FROM XBT_BASELINE_EDU_DATE WHERE MENU_CD = T1.MENU_CD) AS MENU_TYPE FROM XBT_STU_MENU T1 WHERE T1.LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode} AND T1.MENU_CD = #{menuCd}
SELECT MENU_CD, MENU_NAME, MENU_TYPE FROM XBT_STU_MENU WHERE LANGUAGE_CODE = 'kr' ORDER BY P_MENU_CD, MENU_ORDER ASC
